entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .NET throw System.ExecutionEngineException on Step Into 2D Array with JMC disabled. #79415
    8.0.0
  • Returning `Span<T>` assumes memory management #79413
    Future
  • System.Text.Json.Tests.Utf8JsonWriterTests.WriteNumbers test failing in CI #79404
  • System.Tests.ArrayTests.CreateInstance test failing in NativeAOT #79403
  • [API Proposal]: Provide API for freeing Variant memory #79402
  • [Jit][Intrinsics] Local variables mixed up #79399
  • [Android] Assert crashes app #79395
    8.0.0
  • Add support for attribute XML files to NativeAOT #79393
  • Regressions in System.Threading.Tests.Perf_Timer #79409
  • Regressions in System.Threading.Tests.Perf_Lock #79408
  • Regressions in System.IO.Compression.Brotli #79410
  • HTTP requests made by app extremely slow #79405
  • [MSVC][std:c++latest] CoreCLR build failed due to error C2666: 'ExceptionTracker::EnclosingClauseInfo::operator ==': overloaded functions have similar conversions #79383
  • [mono] Add support for library mode in the aot compiler #79377
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Utf8Formatter.TryWrite #79376
  • Mutex ctor will often throw IOException immediately after macOS reboot #79375
    8.0.0
  • Fix and enable the PatternsDataSet_GenerateInputsWithNonBacktracking_MatchWithAllEngines test #79373
    Future
  • How do I discover what counters are available for dotnet-counters? #79372
  • Implement/Convert existing metrics to Meters #79371

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: `ImmutableArray<T>.Builder.ToImmutableAndClear()` #72625
    8.0.0
  • ASPNETCORE_CONTENTROOT being ignored in .NET 7 #78583
  • Test JIT.Regression.CLR-x86-JIT.V1.2-M01.b08046.b08046.b08046 fails #5810
    8.0.0
  • JsonPropertyOrderAttribute doesn't work on property with JsonExtensionDataAttribute #79379
  • File.OpenHandle() limitations #79335
  • [wasm] app startup regression #75598
    8.0.0
  • Test failure readytorun/coreroot_determinism/coreroot_determinism/coreroot_determinism.sh #79320
  • Segfault while initializing build tools on Linux arm64 #79387
  • Extra call in AppContext.BaseDirectory #79150
  • Unnecessary stack spilling for struct instant property access #57055
    8.0.0
  • JIT: Poor codegen when calling an instance method on a temporary, unused struct #42354
    8.0.0
  • Sub-optimal code when the operation "% 1" on integers is met #10956
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Alternative span/memory/string splitting API #76186
    8.0.0
  • GeneratedRegex Attribute Failed to generate code and shows CS8795 error #79367
  • Investigate generating matching strings for test regexes and adding to testbed #25372
    Future
  • [Blazor WASM VS 2022 ] Breakpoints not being hit in Visual Studio #79078

PullRequests

Created

  • [mono] Export unmanagedcallersonly method symbols #79424
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Avx512 upper regs macro #79423
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Enable retbuf optimization for non-temporaries #79422
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove the TypeKey concept as the primary user for the concept is unable to use it effectively. #79418
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Enable `runtime-coreclr jitstress-isas-avx512` pipeline on Linux #79417
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [mono][wasm] Bundle assemblies as WebCIL #79416
    arch-wasm, area-AssemblyLoader-mono
  • Avx512 upper regs variable (Draft) #79414
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix compression #79412
    area-System.Net
  • [release/7.0] Do not override content root with default #79411
    Servicing-consider, area-Extensions-Hosting
  • Temporarily disable NoCallback_RevokedCertificate_NoRevocationChecking_Succeeds #79407
    area-System.Net.Http
  • add --allconfigurations for portable source-build #79400
    source-build
  • Fixes remaining issues with DynamicDependency attribute and adds tests #79398
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add weakly typed Serialize and Deserialize overloads accepting JsonTypeInfo. #79397
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • [mono][tests] Throw InvalidProgramException when ENDFILTER has invalid value type or invalid number of values #79394
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [IGNORE][wasi][wasm] Testing wasi build #79388
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Enforce HttpClient limits on GetFromJsonAsync #79386
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • Allow preinitializing types with canonical forms #79384
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [JIT] X64 - Extend emitter peephole optimization of eliminating unnecessary `mov` instructions #79381
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • fix determin lib name varation logic #79370
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution

Merged

  • Convert b08046 to C# and fix it #79389
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add ImmutableArray<T>.Builder.DrainToImmutable() #79385
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Ignore not relevant rollup warnings #79396
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Fix wrong value in the comment #79401
  • Remaining feedback part1 #79011
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Revert don't need to escape special characters anymore #78320
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Fix startingStackpos tracking for loop in loop #79382
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Implement unmanaged-to-managed direction for vtable stub generator #77130
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Do not override content root with default #79242
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • Update doc to describe host_runtime_contract #79374
    area-Host
  • Delete some remnants from fusion #79380
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Replacing exception strings with those stored in the resx file #79378
  • [mono][interp] Add intrinsic for string allocation #79392
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [mono][interp] Remove some dead opcodes #79343
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [wasm] Lazy init of [JSExport] bindings #77293
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Fix Sse3 => Ssse3 typo #79368
    area-System.Memory, 8.0.0
  • Remove span pinning associated with string.Create #78914
  • JIT: Allow cloning addresses even before initobj #79341
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Delete parts of type system that deal with layouts #79366
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [JIT] - Fixed sub-optimal optimization for `a % 1` to Zero #77760
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add MemoryExtensions.Split #79048
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix BN_is_zero for OpenSSL 1.0.2 non-portable build #79369
    area-System.Security
  • Add experimental Regex test based on SampleMatches #79364
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Fix declaration of local in regex source generator #79362
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions

Updated

  • Avoid caching compilation data and use value equality for SyntaxNodes #79051
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Don't use IlcPath in NativeAOT targets #79233
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Fix dump creation on MacOS Ventura #79360
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 7.0.3
  • Implement Shuffle, GetString, and GetItems on Random{NumberGenerator} #78598
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Use IndexOfAnyValues in the RegexCompiler and source gen #78927
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 8.0.0
  • Ensure that `TryGetContainableHWIntrinsicOp` is non-mutating #79363
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Create analyzer in ComInterfaceGenerator to enforce the generator is used with IUnknown only #78189
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [Merge-on-Red] - Implement Test Process Watcher #78742
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Fixing assert on variable live range for simd12 LCL / STORE_LCL #79182
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Improve CI path-changes-based-triggers to work better #79127
    area-Infrastructure
  • Remove hard_limit_for_bookkeeping #77480
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Implement DivRem intrinsic for X86 #66551
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • [mono][aot] Optimize constrained calls made from gsharedvt methods. #79339
  • [draft][wasi] compile with libs.native #79046
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • New ASCII APIs #75012
    area-System.Buffers, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Remove mono specific SpanHelpers #79215
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [wasm] Outline exception throws in the interp and ifdef out unreachable opcodes #79239
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Produce crashreport.json and use llvm-symbolizer to create stack trace #77578
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • avoid allocations in SendTo and Quic #78591
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • [release/6.0] Fix dump creation on MacOS Ventura #79365
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 7.0.3
  • Move the rearrange_uoh_segments call earlier so that distribute_free_regions can take them into account #79262
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Cache allregs to avoid checking the type repeatedly #76850
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Implement support to symbolOptions from dap. #79284
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Double IndexOf throughput for chars #78861
    area-System.Memory, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] optimize interop startup and linker hints #77256
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Fix handling of backtracking stack with some loops #79361
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.x
  • Stop producing and handling `ADDR` nodes #78246
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Replacing exception strings with those stored in the resx file (#34056) #78341
    area-CoreLib-mono, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Experiment with changing the implementation strategy for RangeListMap #79021
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Mono musl support #76500
    area-Infrastructure-mono, community-contribution
  • Respect SETTINGS_MAX_HEADER_LIST_SIZE on HTTP/2 and HTTP/3 #79281
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • Equalize committed space in free regions and move regions to global free list #77597
    area-GC-coreclr
  • JIT: experiment with early liveness and use it for forward sub and last-use copy elision #79346
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Adding new ReadyToRun helper for static cctor #76898
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][interpreter] Throw when basic blocks after branch are not created #79246
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • WIP: Create AND chains in bool optimizer pass #79283
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Allow Base64Decoder to ignore space chars, add IsValid methods and tests #79334
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Don't embed bitcode on tvOS anymore #79349
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • [mono] Add a managed cache for flags in RuntimeType. #78840
    area-CoreLib-mono
  • [draft][wasm] Memory snapshot #78915
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • [Android] Improvements to remote certificate verification in SslStream #77386
    area-System.Net.Security, os-android, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] [wasm] Add warning code to all warnings produced in WasmAppBuilder #79234
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 7.0.3
  • [release/7.0] [wasm] Catch error from loading "node:crypto" module #79351
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.x
  • [release/7.0][wasm] Add RollForward=Major for WasmAppHost . #79315
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 7.0.x
  • [release/7.0] [wasm] fix marshaling Error to C# as JSType.Any #79352
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.x
  • Split library and package Readme #78888
    area-Meta, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Fix perf. regression caused by signed/unsigned comp #79137
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • warn when TargetFramework is set to netcoreapp5/6/7/8 #29460
  • Wrong path in Microsoft.NET.ApiCompat.targets is preventing ASP.NET Core repo ingesting SDK updates #29451
  • Fail to install MAUI from main branch with error "Failed to install manifest microsoft.net.workload.mono.toolchain version 6.0.13... is not found in NuGet feeds" #29462

Closed

  • Hidden files in the .NET SDK #28598

PullRequests

Created

  • Update NetAnalyzers version for release/7.0.2xx #29464
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update NetAnalyzers version for release/7.0.1xx #29463
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update Microsoft.NET.ApiCompat.targets for net8.0 #29450
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Change .templateengine folder path #29449
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update releases-index.json #29445
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Use linker matching TFM #29441
    Area-ILLink

Merged

  • Bump Newtonsoft.Json from 13.0.1 to 13.0.2 in /src/Assets/TestProjects/PortableToolWithTestProject/App #29433
    Area-Infrastructure, dependencies
  • Bump Newtonsoft.Json from 13.0.1 to 13.0.2 in /src/Assets/TestProjects/PortableTool #29432
    Area-Infrastructure, dependencies

Updated

  • Change the cppcli tests to use the package reference support #29369
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add support for default values of methods parameters in the GenAPI. #29356
    Area-GenAPI
  • extend typo correction functionality with StartsWith and Contains #29350
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Try not building the test assets and see what happens #29376
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-08
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Proposal: Allow [AsyncMethodBuilder(...)] on methods #1407
    10.0
  • [Proposal]: Collection literals #5354
    Working Set

PullRequests

Created

  • limit disposable pattern #6785
  • Update params-span.md following LDM 2022-11-30 #6784

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • PR 64583 broke LSP-based XAML intellisense #65888
    17.5 P3
  • Negated is-expression doesn't work with list patterns #65876
  • Peek definition doesn't work on source generated code #65873
  • IDE0079 (Remove unnecessary suppression) to cover --nowarn command line parameter #65867
  • Improved async method code gen for exceptions #65863
    C# 12.0
  • Implement support for non-C# languages in Editorconfig UI #65859

Closed

  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-33208.235 #65891
  • Side effects of implicit Range indexer on a struct type are not propagated to the receiver #65586
    17.5
  • The compiler produces code with useless redundant instructions for `(X, Y) = (x, y)` #38702
    Backlog
  • StreamJsonRpc.RemoteInvocationException: Cannot enqueue data after PromiseNotToEnqueue. #65872
  • RegexDocumentHighlighter.GetReferences throws when editing regex inside a raw string #65836
  • Variables in list, recursive and var patterns are not colorized as local #59484
    Backlog
  • Support multiple language classifiers in ASP.NET Core #64822

PullRequests

Created

  • Relayer our project system #65890
    Area-IDE
  • Move BasicBuild to new integration test framework and implement #65889
    Area-IDE, Area-Infrastructure
  • Move Generate from usage tests to new framework #65887
    Area-IDE, Area-Infrastructure
  • Reenable quick info tests #65886
    Area-IDE
  • Update all linked files to have the same content object instances when updating the workspace's solution. #65885
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.6-vs-deps #65882
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Use the inner pattern to recreate the decision DAG for is-expressions #65878
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Support Fix All in Solution for Enable Nullable Reference Types refactoring #65877
    Area-IDE
  • Pass cancellation token consistently through lsif generator. #65875
    Area-IDE
  • Enable switch dispatch for is-expressions #65874
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Add support for draft of semantic tokens LSIF spec to LSIF generator #65860
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Simplify lsif generation concepts #65858
    Area-IDE
  • Adjust calculation of invocation escape when return type is ref to ref struct #65857
    Area-Compilers
  • Change property in Rename system to be clearer #65855
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Ensure lvalue struct receivers are not copied by value by implicit Range indexer rewrite #65805
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.6 to release/dev17.6-vs-deps #65884
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #65883
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to release/dev17.6 #65881
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Move to more consistent patterns in the parser. #65724
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Cleanup `SyntaxNormalizerTests` #65516
    Area-Compilers, Test, Community, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #65854
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts, Next
  • Merge main to release/dev17.6 #65870
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Avoid emitting redundant locals in deconstruction assignment #65832
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • Add ExecuteCommandAsync overloads which accept arguments #65847
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix Regex features in raw-string-literals. #65838
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.6-vs-deps #65871
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.6 to release/dev17.6-vs-deps #65869
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Classify pattern variables #59735
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.5-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #65868
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.6 to release/dev17.6-vs-deps #65862
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge release/dev17.5 to release/dev17.5-vs-deps #65866
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to release/dev17.6 #65865
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.5 to main #65864
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to release/dev17.5 #65843
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge main to release/dev17.6 #65861
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Change to release/dev17.6-vs-deps #65856
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Merge main to release/dev17.6 #65853
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/SharedSyntaxTrees #65822
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Switch to non-preview queue to use 17.4.1 instead of 17.4 Preview 5 #65846
    Area-Infrastructure, Next

Updated

  • Disable document outline #65688
    Area-IDE, OnDeckForServicing
  • Add new API to easily tell if a node contains conditional preprocessor directives (without allocations). #65794
    Area-Compilers
  • log data for analyzers/codefixes/refactorings #65158
    Area-IDE
  • Expose constructor that allows for AnalysisOptions and a CancellationToken. #65051
    Area-Analyzers, api-approved
  • Move off of the final usage of an uncached AsyncLazy #65780
    Area-IDE
  • Upgrade to .net 7 release version #65839
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Remove options that have the same editorconfig name #65800
    Area-IDE
  • Atomically update all linked files in a solution snapshot when one of them is updated. #65816
    Area-IDE
  • Avoid reporting ref safety errors for discard assignments #65693
    Area-Compilers
  • Move classification tests to new framework #65734
    Area-IDE
  • Remove code for cloning compilations for skeleton references #65842
    Area-IDE
  • Split out ref safety analysis into a separate pass after binding #64928
    Area-Compilers
  • Deprecate public constructors of various diagnostic analysis context types #64083
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers
  • Emit `DecimalConstantAttribute` for synthesized delegates #65777
    Area-Compilers
  • Enable CA1052 (static holder types should be static) #65830
    Area-Infrastructure, Community
  • Removed 'AnalyzerOptions' reference related to 'AdditionalFiles' #65851
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Refactor snippets #65811
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Stop referencing packages that became inbox on modern .NET. #65810
    Area-Infrastructure, Community
  • WIP: Always cache our lazy values. #65719
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Simplify 2.1 build #45506
    .NET 8 Planning
  • SignalR Server side InvokeCoreAsync blocks connection when client is not processing result async #45503
  • DictionaryModelBinder not working with null default value in .Net 7 #45502
    8.0-preview1
  • Missing JWT token with Safari (macOS and iOS) #45501
  • Nullable `[FromQuery]` primitive says "The value 'null' is not valid" #45500
  • Blazor setDragImage with Drag & Drop #45499
    Backlog
  • RFC - add a way to specify/configure which static assets get published from an RCL #45498
    Backlog

Closed

  • Create an analyzer that warns when a parameter on a route handler delegate has a BindAsync or TryParse method that doesn't comply with RequestDelegateFactory requirements #35733
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Remove temporary workaround to not use msbuild server #43581
    .NET 8 Planning
  • The thrown exception's message is completely useless... #44895
  • Unable to set request body format to binary in minimal api #45265
  • Hidden version files in .NET aspnetcore installation #44559
    Backlog
  • `GetExternalLoginInfoAsync` should work even when `MapInboundClaims` is `false` #45197
  • Unable to restore item #45397
  • POST without Content-Length - 411 Length required #45495
  • .NET 6 AmbiguousMatchException Mixed Technology App #45493
  • Blazor Authentication (Hosted Web Assembly) via External Social Login Providers doesn't redirect to server endpoint on callback url to complete authentication state in deployed environment (Azure App Service) #45419
  • blazor wasm publish to IIS has error #45294
    7.0.x
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.NewtonsoftJson printing errors more than once. #45311

PullRequests

Merged

  • Run code analysis on generated code to support Razor routes #45496
    area-infrastructure, area-web-frameworks, 8.0-preview1
  • Code analyzer to detect if route parameters are parsable #45286
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1
  • CreatedResult should accept null location #42576
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks, 8.0-preview1
  • Support `sub` as `ExternalLoginInfo.ProviderKey` #45198
    area-identity, community-contribution, 8.0-preview1
  • Analyzers: Cache route model and reuse in RouteHandlerAnalyzer #45486
    area-infrastructure, area-web-frameworks, 8.0-preview1
  • Vectorized HttpCharacters (and used IndexOfAnyValues in other places found) #45300
    Perf, blocked, area-runtime, community-contribution, blog-candidate, 8.0-preview1

Updated

  • [release/2.1] Turn on Component Governance #40885
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 2.1.x
  • Improve pfx support for CertificateConfigLoader #43719
    area-runtime
  • Add Kestrel named pipes transport #44426
    area-runtime, blog-candidate
  • Add transport selector interface to Kestrel sockets and QUIC transports #44832
    area-runtime
  • Run Selenium tests on Playwright via an adapter [experiment] #45284
  • Introduce non-virtual RegisterTokenProviderCore method. #45413
    area-identity
  • Add attributes to SignalR source generator #38025
    area-signalr
  • Complete inner Pipewriter in HttpLoggingMiddleware #39989
    area-runtime
  • feat : Add `StringSyntax` for regex parameters #40589
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Add IgnoreQueryString parameter to NavLink #40990
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • JSON "null" request body rejected as an empty request body #41002
    community-contribution, pr: pending author input, area-web-frameworks
  • Add option to not cache assembly references in runtime razor compilation #41086
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Fix flaky HTTP/2 test #41181
    area-runtime
  • Resume the IIS state machine on the thread pool #41271
    Perf, area-runtime
  • Simplify and optimize async parameters in RequestDelegateFactory #42588
    area-runtime
  • Introduce per-HealthCheckRegistration parameters #42646
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Guard against httpcontext disconnect race #42838
    area-runtime
  • Fix the IsKnownImmutableType method to return true for enum types #42901
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • [blazor][wasm] load .js and .wasm assets by runtime #43049
    area-blazor, blazor-wasm, arch-wasm
  • [SignalR] [Java] Log 'WebSocket stopped' once #43532
    area-signalr, signalr-client-java
  • Update SpaProxy.cs #43663
    area-mvc, feature-spa, community-contribution
  • Add CssClass property to ValidationSummary #43928
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • [Blazor wasm] Use provided loadBootResource function to override how config is loaded #43969
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • `IsCharWhitespace` for HTML5 spec without char[].IndexOf #44004
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Improve IFormCollection.Items documentation #44372
    area-runtime
  • Update selenium dependency versions #44834
  • Support checking for required members in minimal APIs #45084

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Provide a keyboard interactions property so scrollable views can influence closing soft keyboard on scroll #11983
    Backlog
  • Custom Android Handler throws NRE when using Cell.ToPlatform(MauiContext) #11980
  • Enable `AdjustPan` and `AdjustResize` behavior for iOS as well as Android #11979
  • Android app crash with NavigationPage in Release build #11978
  • Switching Current Application After Initialization #11977
    Backlog
  • Published version of app with Popups crashes #11976
  • Document issues with using ValueConverter in CollectionView #11975
    Backlog
  • Be able to pick which environments MAUI targets instead of all of them #11959
  • XamlC resolves x:DataType incorrectly #11956
    Backlog
  • MAUI Page transition animation background color #11955
    Backlog
  • App shell does not fill screen on iOS when no splash screen is added to project. #11951

Closed

  • 'dotnet tool restore' for maui repo fails on macOS #10443
  • Pair to Mac - Object reference not set to an instance of an object. #11954
  • iOS - CollectionView inside of RefreshView does not size correctly #7315
    .NET 7 Planning
  • editor Small problem #11815
  • .NET 7 Android - signal 11 (SIGSEGV), code 1 (SEGV_MAPERR) - (.NET ThreadPool) #11828
  • Border does not clip when stroke shape is provided in iOS #11950
  • Maui Template Projects not showing up in VS Community or Professional with Maui workload installed #11851
  • Domain Architecture causing build to fail Windows is fine Andriod fails #11825
  • Button "normal" visual state not being correctly applied upon release of button #11947
  • Pair to Mac suddenly failing: Object reference not set to an instance of an object. #11957
  • Button BackgroundColor does not change with IsEnabled State on Release to Device Only #8961
    Backlog
  • Localization via satellite assemblies doesn't work for android when the app built in debug mode. #4470
  • Generics Serialization using Json.NET throws "Attempting to JIT compile method '(wrapper delegate-invoke)' while running in aot-only mode" in signed release build iOS-applications #8122
  • Android build compiles fine:Xaml Parser fails to understand the expression when placed wrongly and compiles in release #10982
  • Maui Blazor for iOS works on macbook from command line but fails to start when installed on Iphone using TestFlight. Using IConnectivity, IGeolocation, IMediaPicker #7945
  • Listview Binding Data not display (in Release) #11617
    Backlog
  • VS 2022: deploy to Android issue #11848
  • Binding . won't work in release mode #11806
  • .NET MAUI Shell - FlyoutItem - Icon displays on Windows platform but not on Android platform #6924
    Backlog
  • [Windows] When use a TabbedPage as App.Mainpage, On Windows the Tabbar disappear when window lost the Focus #9546
  • MAUI Application not properly recompiled #11282
  • I think this is a duplicate of #5652 and I think half the time when files are moved in VS the IDE decides it does not want to track the files and adds an explicit remove for everything. #11596
  • Height Request of Frame not working in Android #11750
  • .NET MAUI : Error CS0012- The type 'object' is defined in an assembly that is not referenced. You must add a reference to assembly 'Xamarin.iOS, Version=0.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=84e04ff9cfb79065'. #11399

PullRequests

Created

  • [xamlc] remove `LoadInSeparateAppDomain` and `static` state #11982
    area/Xaml </>, area/perf 🏎️
  • Address Android SearchBar keyboard issue relating to TextTransform #11981
  • Tests embed screenshot #11952
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #11949
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

Merged

  • Bump Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.NetAnalyzers from 7.0.0-preview1.22559.1 to 7.0.0 #11958
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [net7.0] _itemsSource may be null in CarouselViewLoopManager #11967
    area/collectionview 📃
  • [net7.0] Make iOS Label HTML behavior compatible with Forms #11966
    area/controls 🎮
  • [net7.0] Fix MauiIcon ForegroundScale on systems with comma as decimal separator #11965
    area/single project ☝️
  • [net7.0] [iOS] Avoid propagate Map tap event tapping a Pin on iOS #11964
    area/Maps🗺
  • [net7.0] Fix Managing Layout Children #11963
    area/layout 🔲
  • [net7.0] [Catalyst] Fix brushes in Frame #11962
  • [net7.0] Align Shapes Fill property behavior with Xamarin.Forms #11961
    area/drawing ✏️
  • [net7.0] [Android] Fix ObjectDisposedException on Android resizing images #11960
    area/image :framed_picture:
  • [net7.0] Fix Element.ChildRemoved event sender #11973
  • [net7.0] Ensure invisible views don't get rows/columns when generating AndExpand layouts #11972
    area/layout 🔲
  • [net7.0] [iOS] Fix issue loading local files in WebView #11968
    area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • [net7.0] [iOS] RadioButton a11y #11969
    area/a11y, area/controls 🎮
  • [net7.0] [WinUI] Fix RefreshView crash if no content is specified #11971
    area/layout 🔲
  • Make OnShouldReceiveMapTouch static #11974
    area/Maps🗺

Updated

  • [iOS] Fix Entry Next Keyboard Button Finds Next TextField #11914
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, .NET 7 + Servicing
  • Update WebAuthenticator to support custom ResponseDecoder (#11641) #11710
    t/breaking 💥, area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • Make inline video / picture in picture enabled by default on WebView for iOS #11075
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • Added StartPath to get/set initial BlazorWebView URL #11942
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • Fix crash using BackButtonBehavior and navigating to root #11438
    t/bug, area/navigation 🧭, area/shell 🐢
  • Update Essentials Flashlight API Docs #11920
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Update Essentials FileSystem API Docs #11919
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Fix Switch Off Track Color - Fixes #10099 #10758
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-switch
  • Update Essentials MainThread API Docs #11934
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Prepare MAUI to support building with NuGets #11946
    area/setup 🪄
  • Add missing await call for color match test #11016
    area/controls 🎮
  • Remove gesture from page that interferes with accessibility #10948
    area/a11y, area/gestures
  • Fix Secondary Tap Scenarios on Android #10619
  • Update Essentials Geolocation API Docs #11924
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Consider WithQueryTimeout through linq #29804
  • EF7 SqlServer Migration is trying to update columns on History table before creating the History table if any new columns are added in the same migration #29799

Closed

  • SaveChanges circular dependency in unique unfiltered index #29647
    8.0.0
  • Mixed_sync_async_in_query_cache is flaky #16218
    7.0.0
  • Comparing a property with a value converter against null throws exception in EF7 InMemory #29603
    8.0.0
  • EF Core 7 InMemory database - An issue during invoking method AddRange/UpdateRange with strongly typed ids #29636
    8.0.0
  • Stop using LegacyReferenceEqualityComparer #29428
    8.0.0
  • Erroneous circular dependency detection when updating entities with composite primary key and one-to-one relationships #29737
    8.0.0
  • ConfigureWarnings example deprecated #28236
  • EF Core 7.0 generates query with non-existent columns for composite foreign key #29697
  • Unclear example query #23708
  • RevEng: Redundant ValueGeneratedNever for non-integer PK property #9221
    7.0.0
  • EnsureDeleted is no-op for SQLite :memory: database #15923
    8.0.0
  • "Interesting" navigation named generated by reverse engineering #27832
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/7.0] Avoid reduntant looping in property metadata #29807
    Servicing-consider
  • Second attempt at enabling debugging in richnav build. #29806
  • Avoid reduntant looping in property metadata #29805
  • Null FK value when detaching Added principal by Remove #29803
  • Bump Newtonsoft.Json from 13.0.1 to 13.0.2 in /test/EFCore.Specification.Tests #29801
    type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • [release/7.0] Reset query tracking behavior correctly if set on DbContextOptions #29797
    Servicing-approved, 7.0.3

Merged

  • Make unique index SaveChanges topological dependency optional for null values #29796
  • Fix in-memory issues with value comparers #29745
  • Remove LegacyReferenceEqualityComparer #29798
  • Enable system debugging for RichNav task. #29802
  • Fix build issues in IDE #29800
  • Implement EnsureDeleted for SQLite in-memory database #29794
  • Remove common property prefix navigation naming #29771
  • Reset query tracking behavior correctly if set on DbContextOptions #29766

Updated

  • [release/7.0] Scaffolding: Fix code for EF6 many-to-many pattern #29793
    Servicing-consider
  • [release/7.0] Scaffolding: Handle FK on keyless entity type #29779
    Servicing-consider
  • [release/7.0] Scaffolding: Fix missing HasForeignKey when principal key is an alternate key #29731
    Servicing-consider
  • [release/7.0] Fix making column required on SQL Server with idempotent migrations #29784
    Servicing-approved, 7.0.3
